cards.name: Cloud, Ex-SOLDIER
cards.effects: Haste. When Cloud enters the battlefield, attach up to one target Equipment you control to it; Whenever Cloud attacks, draw a card for each equipped attacking creature you control. If Cloud has power 7 or greater, create two Treasure tokens;

cards.name: Isochron Scepter

cards.name: Inspiring Statuary
cards.effects: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise;

cards.name: Sword of the Animist
cards.effects: Equipped creature gets +1/+1; Whenever it attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle; Equip {2};

cards.name: Colossus Hammer
cards.effects: Equipped creature gets +10/+10 and loses flying; Equip {8};

cards.name: Buster Sword
cards.effects: Equipped creature gets +3/+2; Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then you may cast a spell from your hand with mana value less than or equal to that damage without paying its mana cost; Equip {2};

cards.name: Conformer Shuriken
cards.effects: Equipped creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls. If that creature has greater power than this creature, put +1/+1 counters on this creature equal to the difference.”; Equip {2};

cards.name: Summoner's Grimoire
cards.effects: Job Select — Equipped creature is a Shaman in addition to its other types and has “Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If it’s an enchantment creature, it enters tapped and attacking”; Equip {3};

cards.name: The Fire Crystal
cards.effects: Red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast; Creatures you control have haste; {4}{R}{R}, {T}: Create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step;

cards.name: The Earth Crystal
cards.effects: Green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast; If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, put twice that many on it instead; {4}{G}{G}, {T}: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control;

cards.name: Sculpting Steel
cards.effects: As Sculpting Steel comes into play, you may choose an artifact in play. If you do, Sculpting Steel comes into play as a copy of that artifact;

cards.name: Conjurer's Closet
cards.effects: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control;

cards.name: Vandalblast
cards.effects: Destroy target artifact you don’t control. Overload {4}{R}.

cards.name: Worldfire
cards.effects: Exile all permanents. Exile all cards from all hands and graveyards. Each player’s life total becomes 1.

cards.name: Cloud's Limit Break
cards.effects: Tiered (Choose oe nadditional cost) — Cross Slash - Destroy target tapped creature; Blade Beam {1} - Destroy any number of target tapped creatures with different controllers; Omnislash {3}{W} - Destroy all tapped creatures.

cards.name: Tifa's Limit Break
cards.effects: Tiered (Choose one additional cost) — Somersault - Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn; Meteor Strikes {2} - Double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn; Final Heaven {6}{G} - Triple target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Boros Charm
cards.effects: Choose one — Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker; or permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn; or target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Signal the Clans
cards.effects: Search your library for three creature cards and reveal them. If you reveal three cards with different names, choose one at random and put it into your hand. Shuffle.

cards.name: Battle Menu
cards.effects: Choose one — Attack - Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token; Ability - Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn; Magic - Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater; Item - You gain 4 life.

cards.name: Austere Command
cards.effects: Choose two — Destroy all artifacts; destroy all enchantments; destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less; destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.

cards.name: Terminus
cards.effects: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners’ libraries. Miracle {W}.

cards.name: Nibelheim Aflame
cards.effects: Choose target creature you control. It deals damage equal to its power to each other creature. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, discard your hand, then draw four cards.

cards.name: Esper Origins

transform.name: Summon: Esper Manduin

cards.name: Blind Obedience
cards.effects: Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped. Extort.

cards.name: Legion's Initiative
cards.effects: Red creatures you control get +1/+0; White creatures you control get +0/+1; {R}{W}, Exile Legion’s Initiative: Exile all creatures you control. At the beginning of the next combat, return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control and those creatures gain haste until end of turn;

cards.effects: Flying. Saga — I/II: Destroy up to one target nonland permanent; III: Draw two cards; IV: Mega Flare - This creature deals damage equl to the total mana value of other permanents you control to each opponent;

Saga — I: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or tapped creature an opponent controls; II/III: Until your next turn, creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures.; IV: Create X Treasure tokens, where X is the number of opponents who control a creature with power 4 or greater;

cards.name: Summon: Kujata
cards.effects: Trample. Haste. Saga — I: Lightning - This creature deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures; II: Ice - Up to three target creatures can't block this turn; III: Fire - Discard a card, then draw two cards. When you discard a card this way, this creature deals damage equal to that card's mana value to each opponent;

cards.name: Summon: Fenrir

cards.name: Summon: Primal Garuda
cards.effects: Flying. Saga — I: Aerial Blast - Deal 4 damage to target tapped creature an opponent controls; II/III — Another target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Sidequest: Catch a Fish
cards.effects: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it’s an artifact or creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you put a card into your hand this way, create a Food token and transform this enchantment;)

cards.effects: Trample. If you tap a permanent for mana, it produces three times as much of that mana instead;

cards.effects: When Zidane enters, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it. It gains lifelink and haste until end of turn; Whenever an opponent gains control of a permanent from you, you create a Treasure token;

Exile Phoenix, then return it to the battlefield (front face up);

cards.name: Clive, Ifrit’s Dominant

cards.name: Venat, Heart of Hydaelyn
cards.effects: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, draw a card (only once each turn); Hero's Sundering — {7}, {T}: Exile target nonland permanent. Transform Venat. Activate only as a sorcery;

transform.name: Hydaelyn, the Mothercrystal
transform.effects: Indestructible. Blessing of Life — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Until your next turn, it gains indestructible. If that creature is legendary, draw a card;

cards.name: Tyrant of Discord
cards.effects: When Tyrant of Discord enters the battlefield, target opponent chooses a permanent at random they control and sacrifices it. If a nonland permanent was sacrificed this way, repeat this process;

cards.name: Savageborn Hydra
cards.effects: Double strike. Savageborn Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it; {1}{R/G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Savageborn Hydra. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery;

cards.name: Boros Reckoner
cards.effects: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target; {R/W}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn;

cards.name: Angel of Serenity
cards.effects: Flying. When Angel of Serenity enters, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards; When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners’ hands;

cards.name: Angel of Glory’s Rise
cards.effects: Flying. When Angel of Glory’s Rise enters, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield;

cards.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
cards.effects: Vigilance, reach. Ruric Thar attacks each combat if able; Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player;

cards.name: Yuna, Hope of Spira
cards.effects: During your turn, Yuna and enchantment creatures you control have trample, lifelink, and ward {2}; At the beginning of your end step, return up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it;

cards.name: Galepowder Mage
cards.effects: Flying. Whenever Galepowder Mage attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step;

cards.name: Annie Joins Up
cards.effects: When Annie Joins Up enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls; If a triggered ability of a legendary permanent you control would trigger, it triggers an additional time;

cards.name: Traveling Chocobo
cards.effects: You may look at the top card of your library any time; You may play lands and cast Bird spells from the top of your library; If a land or Bird you control entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time;

cards.name: Serah Farron
cards.effects: The first legendary creature spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast; At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control two or more other legendary creatures, you may transform Serah Farron;

transform.effects: The first legendary creature spell you cast each turn cost {2} less; Legendary creatures you control get +2/+2;
